title: crypto/tls: Expose signature_algorithms in ClientHelloInfo
body:
The [`signature_algorithms`](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5246#section-7.4.1.4.1) extension is provided in the TLS 1.2 ClientHello and could be used with the existing `GetCertificate` hook to choose between certificate chains with RSA and ECDSA signatures if exposed in `ClientHelloInfo`.

/cc @agl
